summary: The story of a crime is unwound during carnival days in 1910s Madrid in this atmospheric Spanish film.
cast: Conchita Montes|Fernando Fernán Gómez|Guillermo Marín|Julia Lajos|Juana Mansó|Manuel Requena|Francisco Hernández|Ildefonso Cuadrado|Mariana Larrabeiti|Joaquín Roa|Manuel Arbó|Fernando Aguirre|Ginés Gallego|Alicia Romay|Luciano Díaz|José Martín|Edgar Neville|Carlos Álvarez Segura
title: Domingo de carnaval
